typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	run_id as string ('')
}
source(output(
		flight_id as string,
		delay_type as string,
		duration_mins as string,
		delay_code as string,
		delay_code_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> StgFlightsDelay
source(output(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT as timestamp,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM as string,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE as string,
		BASE_AIR_PORT as string,
		CRGO_WGT as integer,
		ESTD_ARRVL as timestamp,
		ESTD_DPTR as timestamp,
		FLT_DT as date,
		FLT_ID as long,
		FLT_NUM as string,
		FLT_TYPE as string,
		FUEL_IN as double,
		FUEL_OUT as double,
		FUEL_UPLIFT as integer,
		IS_CNCLD as boolean,
		IS_VERFD as boolean,
		MAINT_LOG_PG as string,
		NOTES as string,
		SCHDD_ARRVL as timestamp,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR as timestamp,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		UPDTD_AT as timestamp,
		DLAY_TYP as string,
		DURTN_MNT as integer,
		DLAY_CD as string,
		DLAY_CD_NAME as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StgFlights
RemoveADFColumns split(isNull(DLAY_CD) || isNull(DLAY_CD_NAME) || isNull(FLT_ID) || isNull(DLAY_TYP),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Reject, FilteredData)
ConditionalSplit1@FilteredData, StgFlights exists(ConditionalSplit1@FilteredData@FLT_ID == StgFlights@FLT_ID,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FlightsIdExists
ConditionalSplit1@FilteredData, StgFlights exists(ConditionalSplit1@FilteredData@FLT_ID == StgFlights@FLT_ID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FlightsIdDoesntExists
ConditionalSplit1@Reject derive(Reject_Reason = "Validation Error: NULLS Found") ~> AddRejectReasonNull
FlightsIdDoesntExists derive(Reject_Reason = "Flight ID not found in Flights Table") ~> AddRejectReasonNoId
StgFlightsDelay select(mapColumn(
		FLT_ID,
		DLAY_TYP,
		DURTN_MNT,
		DLAY_CD,
		DLAY_CD_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveADFColumns
UnionRejections derive(ADF_TIME_STMP = currentTimestamp(),
		ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddADFColumns
FlightsIdExists derive(ADF_TIME_STMP = currentTimestamp(),
		ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddADFColumns2
AddRejectReasonNoId, AddRejectReasonNull union(byName: true)~> UnionRejections
AddADFColumns sink(truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		FLT_ID,
		DLAY_TYP,
		DURTN_MNT,
		DLAY_CD,
		DLAY_CD_NAME,
		REJECT_REASON = Reject_Reason,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RejectTable
AddADFColumns2 sink(truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FlightsDelayAcpt
